song.name: Alone Infection

verse.line: Shit attacking from the other side

chorus.line: What is it like to you?
No one can see the colors but you

song.verse: VOID! Shit attacking from the other side YUCK! Alone Infection Chaos! ABCDEF GO! Light and (darkness) invisible (oh yeah) Your soul dissipates Destruction (destruction) reduction (oh yeah) Tower of Babel
Messiah Will not come Parallax! Paradox! Paradigm will attack We've got only one sky Blue, red, and black paranoia What is it like to you? No one can see the colors but you

verse.line: I had to run away from here
What is it like to you?
No one can see the colors but you

chorus.line: What is it like to you?
No one can see the colors
